amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the report by the Secretary of the Treasury to include individual salary and wage information, as well as projections of consumer spending and the impact of spending cuts on gross domestic product.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 114-420 to require the Treasury Secretary's report to also include individual salary and wage information, as well as projections of consumer spending and the impact of spending cuts on gross domestic product.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 245 (Roll no. 73).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 245 (Roll no. 73).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
